Returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if a virtual machine is needed or if a virtual machine already exists and there’s an indication that Java classes are provided.

# NSJavaNeedsToLoadClasses

**Article**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a virtual machine is needed or if Java classes are provided.

## Overview

Returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if a virtual machine is needed or if a virtual machine already exists and there’s an indication that Java classes are provided.
title: NSJavaNeedsToLoadClasses
